availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Landsaw Hurst (Breathitt, Kentucky, lawyer and commissioner.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Perry County, Kentucky native. Son of Samuel H. Hurst and Sarah Hurst. Attorney in Breathitt County in 1860. Commissioner of the Board of Enrollment in the Ninth Congressional District of Kentucky in October of 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 116B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District No. 1, p. 389.
Find A Grave, "William Landsaw Hurst (1829-1920)," Memorial #50140122, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50140122 (accessed June 18, 2019).
KYR-0001-003-0003
